  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DragonCardHandler
    Handles the logic for assigning creatures to dragon card buttons in the game.
    LoadingHandler
    The LoadingHandler class handles loading game data from a JSON file.
    MovementHandler
    The MovementHandler class manages the movement logic in the game.
    SavingHandler
    The SavingHandler class handles the saving of game data to a JSON file.
    VictoryHandler
    The VictoryHandler class is responsible for handling victory conditions in the game.
    VolcanoCardHandler
    The VolcanoCardHandler class is responsible for assigning creatures to volcano cards.
